## Learning objectives

* Explain the linkages between the Chesapeake Watershed Agreement Goals and Outcomes and coastal monitoring
* Explain whether we are on track to meeting particular Goals and Outcomes and how we know whether we are on track
* List basic water quality parameters and how they relate the Goals and Outcomes
